Author: plshealme
Text: honestly this experience just sorta put me in a closet frenzy and i decided to try on tons of clothes and get rid (sell/donate) of the things that don't fit me and surprise, surprise... most of my things don't fit me anymore :( even some of my favourite clothes which i am currently mourning

Author: 3cats_in_atrenchcoat
Text: I feel this. I hate having my size fluctuate so much. It's so annoying that I can't wear 1/2 of my wardrobe at any given time. granted  I might just be being crazy about that.
